parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Resource ID of the group box

title: IPropertyManagerPage2.IAddGroupBox
description: Adds a group box to a PropertyManager page.
signature:
PropertyManagerPageGroup IAddGroupBox( 
   System.Int32
ID
,
   System.String
Caption
,
   System.Int32
Options
)

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Resource ID of the group box

returns: Newly created PropertyManager page group box
remarks:
Use this method to set properties on the PropertyManager page before the page is displayed or while it is closed. See
IPropertyManagerPage2::Show2
and
PropertyManagerPage2::Close
for details.
To change the title of an existing group box, use
IPropertyManagerPageGroup::Caption
.
